1.text: Complete the sentences in the passive voice.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Complete the sentences in the passive voice.</prosody></speak>

2.text: The school main hall looked very nice. It ………… ……………… (paint) recently.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The school main hall looked very nice. It ………… ……………… (paint) recently.</prosody></speak>

3.text: We had a lot of homework last week. We …… ……. (give) two reading assignments.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We had a lot of homework last week. We …… ……. (give) two reading assignments.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Heshan ……………… (award) the trophy for the best batsman for his outstanding performance in the finals. He was 88 not out.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='heʃan'>Heshan</phoneme> ……………… (award) the trophy for the best batsman for his outstanding performance in the finals. He was 88 not out.</prosody></speak>

5.text: The Children's Day …… ………… (celebrate) at our school yesterday. All the students …… …….(take) out to see a film.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The Children's Day …… ………… (celebrate) at our school yesterday. All the students …… …….(take) out to see a film.</prosody></speak>

8.text: These historical events are written in the active voice. Rewrite them in passive voice using the table given in activity 2 in the Workbook.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>These historical events are written in the active voice. Rewrite them in passive voice using the table given in activity 2 in the Workbook.</prosody></speak>

9.text: 1. Christopher Columbus discovered America 2. Guglielmo Marconi invented the radio 3. Valmiki wrote the Ramayanaya 4. The ancient Egyptians built the pyramids
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Christopher Columbus discovered America 2. Guglielmo Marconi invented the radio 3. Valmiki wrote the Ramayanaya 4. The ancient Egyptians built the pyramids</prosody></speak>
